 This is a good clear radio Frank, what kind is it?=C2=A0 They are very =
clear, sf



-----Original Message-----
From: Frank Sumption <purplealie=
ngirl@...>

Sent:=
 Tue, Oct 19, 2010 1:08 am
Subject: [RTSC] Is random as good/better? [1 Att=
achment]

          =C2=A0                                            [Atta=
chment(s) from Frank Sumption included below]                       
Random=
 sweep, at 3 seconds "Hultay keeps getting an awful love", I don't know wha=
t it means, but it seems clearer than usual.=C2=A0 I've noticed this with r=
andom, if and when it works, that the phrases are more connected and longer=
, and radio broadcasts tend to disappear.=C2=A0 they also talk about Hultay=
 often.
  =C2=A0
 =C2=A0F-S

=
<div></div>

<div>Random sweep, at 3 seconds "Hultay keeps getting an awful=
 love", I don't know what it means, but it seems clearer than usual.  =
I've noticed this with random, if and when it works, that the phrases are m=
ore connected and longer, and radio broadcasts tend to disappear.  the=
y also talk about Hultay often.</div>
  
<div> </div>
 
<div> F-S=
